fromaccount: The name of the account to move the funds from.
toaccount: The name of the account to move the funds to.
amount: The amount of bitcoins to move.
minconf: This parameter is no longer used. If parameter #5 needs to be specified, this can be any integer.
comment: A comment to assign to this move payment.
help:
Requires wallet support.The move RPC moves a specified amount from one account in your wallet to another using an off-block-chain transaction. 

 Parameter #1—from account. 

 Parameter #2—to account. 

 Parameter #3—amount to move. 

 Parameter #4—an unused parameter.

 Parameter #5—a comment. 

 Result—true on success.
